title: Modern Watch Face
summary: Download now and enjoy Modern Watch Face !

descriptionHTML:
Looking for a new beautiful theme to personalize your smart watch? Excellent! Modern Watch Face is targeting everyone who enjoys beautiful watch faces.
Refreshing design combined with beautiful colors make our new Watch Face a perfect choice. Download now Modern Watch Face and make your device screen look amazing.
How to setup Modern Watch Face:
★ Install Android Wear first!
★ Open Android Wear and synchronize your device.
★ Click “More” from the watchfaces list and choose Modern Watch Face.
★ That’s it! New watch face will display in a few seconds.
★ Try different themes and colors and choose the best one!
We are releasing every day different watchfaces for any mood or style. With us, you have plenty of themes you can choose from. Simple, complex, elegant, minimal, classic, modern, exquisite, colorful, vintage, golden and plenty new ones are waiting to be discovered!
Features:
★ Designed by professional artists !
★ Battery friendly !
★ Easy installing process
★ Compatible with all Android Wear devices
★ Analog display
★ New beautiful themes every day !!!
You can check anytime our best list of beautiful wear themes by clicking the “More watch faces” button in the Modern Watch Face app settings menu.
Modern Watch Face is compatible with:
★ ASUS ZENWATCH
★ LG G WATCH R
★ MOTO 360
★ SONY SMARTWATCH 3
★ LG G WATCH
★ SAMSUNG GEAR LIVE
★ HUAWEI WATCH NEW!
★ LG WATCH URBANE NEW!


Our watch faces are thoroughly tested on various devices so we can provide top quality, bug free products! Also, if you have any suggestions on how we can improve your experience or if you would like to see a particular watch face with some specific design please write us at the e-mail address: watchfacebytme@gmail.com. Your feedback is very important for us.
comments: Unattractive Not as good looking as the photo. Ugly gray border around half of the edge.  The low power clock face is even worse. Uninstalling right away.
Boring Night mode No option to make night mode with colours! Developer please do something about it! It will be perfect otherwise!
you need to update it for the new andoid version
recentChanges: Updated to support Moto 360 ambidextrous feature.
